overview: Shane Douglas challenges Raven for the ECW World Championship. Bam Bam Bigelow battles Cactus Jack. Commissioner Tod Gordon faces Bill Alfonso. The Dudleys face The Eliminators for the ECW World Tag Team Titles. Sabu takes on 2 Cold Scorpio. Sandman goes one-on-one with Axl Rotten. The Pitbulls square off against The Blue Meanie & Stevie Richards!
title: ECW Just Another Night
